overview: Inside the prison, El-Ghazouly helps Adawi, Salkha, Attwa, Mensi and Sayed Balkouna to escape from prison in order to carry out a 30-day mission, which is to restore Shafika's nightclub, Which he inherited from her late husband and quarreled with her husband's son who is trying to do anything to remove it from his path.

production_companies.name: El Sobky Films for Cinema Production

title: 30 Days of Luxury
